author: Jack Date
title: Judge orders home confinement for accused COVID-19 fraudster, citing virus outbreak
description: The "professional fraudster" allegedly ran a mask scheme while out on bond.
content: As the COVID-19 crisis spread from China to Europe throughout February, there was growing concern that an outbreak in the U.S. was on the horizon. One glaring vulnerability was coming into focus -- there were not enough masks, gloves and other personal protec… [+4683 chars]
